text: This is a list of episodes from the Fox animated television series Bobby's World. The series premiered on September 8, 1990 and ended on February 23, 1998. A total of 80 half-hour episodes were produced, and reruns on NBC Kids ==Fox Kids Order== ===Season 1: 1987/88=== # Title Original airdate Prod. code ===Season 2: 1988=== # Title Original airdate Prod. code ===Season 3: 1989/90=== # Title Original airdate Prod. code ===Season 4: 1993-1994=== # Title Original airdate Prod. code ===Season 5: 1994-1995=== # Title Original airdate Prod. code ===Season 6: 1995-1996=== # Title Original airdate Prod. code ===Season 7: 1997-1998=== # Title Original airdate Prod. code Category:Lists of animated television series episodes
title: List of Bobby's World episodes
